    • Player

      public Player​(java.util.List<Card> cards, java.lang.String askStand)
      Simple constructor ,initialize the player and giving him zero score at the begin.
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards between the hands of the player
      askStand - asking for stand means to end the round, will be by on letter y for yes and N for no.
